text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Cressey, California |other_name = |native_name = |settlement_type = Census designated place |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |nickname = |pushpin_map = California |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_map_caption = Location in California |coordinates = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Merced |established_title = |established_date = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_sq_mi = 1.76 |area_total_km2 = 4.55 |area_land_sq_mi = 1.76 |area_land_km2 = 4.55 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.00 |area_water_km2 = 0.00 |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_ft = 167 |elevation_m = 51 |population_total = 366 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_density_sq_mi = auto |population_density_km2 = auto |timezone = Pacific |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 95312 |area_code_type = Area code |area_code = 209 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank1_info = , |footnotes = }} Cressey (formerly, Cressy) is a census-designated place in Merced County, California. It is north-northwest of Atwater. The population was 366 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Merced County, California
